name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kept! - The Save Button for your Internet

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kept saves and organizes every page you keep into a free personal archive that works seamlessly across all your devices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Kept is your memory in the cloud.

Kept saves and organizes every page you keep into a free personal archive that works seamlessly across all your devices. 

Kept makes your digital life easier. With your own Kept archive you can reference, recall and share your pages with friends instantly.
